description: Name of State of Colorado identified Aquaculture Facility and relative location. Colorado has a rich history of aquaculture development and production. Some of the first fish production facilities in the country were established in this state and as a result of the relative limitations imposed on traditional aquaculture by the state's natural resources and climate, some individuals and companies have resorted to more innovative approaches and technologies for producing warmwater aquatic organisms.
